channel.title: Editor: W. Harold Dalgliesh on

item.title: Truman's Point Four
item.description: Strange, Susan. “Truman’s Point Four.” In Year Book of World Affairs 1950, edited by George W. Keeton, Georg Schwarzenberger, 264-288. London: Stevens, 1950. Strange discusses Truman’s fourth declared guiding rule of American foreign policy for the years 1949-1953, that ‘Our aim should be to help the free peoples of the world, through their own efforts to produce more clothing, more materials for housing and more mechanical power to lighten their burdens’, stressing the technical and international nature of future assistance.
